comment.author: 25634208@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Sydney Harbour Bridge, and we'd love to have this added to the group! -- Seen in your Sydney Harbour Bridge set. (?)

comment.author: 67507070@N00
comment._content: This is almost certainly the contingent from Hornsby Girls High School. One of the girls wrote later in the school magazine about marching over the bridge, and being told by their teacher to break step.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/67507070@N00] 
Safety first I guess! You wouldn't want the bridge falling down during the opening celebrations - but you'd hope it could withstand a group of marching school girls!
- AG
